body.text:
Dear PayPal Customer,

Your monthly statement for January 2024 is now available in your PayPal account.

To view your statement:
1. Log in to your PayPal account at paypal.com
2. Go to Account Settings
3. Click on Statements

If you have any questions about your statement, please contact our customer service team.

Thank you for using PayPal.

PayPal Customer Service
